name: sw london I views are my own

content.html: If anyone was wondering what good benefits are: •Pension scheme above the minimum •Life assurance plans •Subsidised healthcare/dental care •Continued learning and development schemes •Hybrid working •Company equity •Family working policies •Discounts
content.value:
If anyone was wondering what good benefits are:

•Pension scheme above the minimum 
•Life assurance plans
•Subsidised healthcare/dental care
•Continued learning and development schemes
•Hybrid working
•Company equity
•Family working policies
•Discounts
